caseTitle: President ZTBL, Islamabad v. Kishwar Khan & others
tagline: (1) Discussion on master and servant relationship. (2) Laws exist to protect the fundamental human rights of the members of society.      (3) The function of the court is to do substantial justice and not to knockout or nonsuit the party on technicalities. (4) While rejecting the plaint under Order VII Rule 11 CPC, the court is under obligation to must give a meaningful reading to the plaint. (5) Under Section 9 of C.P.C., the ouster of civil court jurisdiction cannot be presumed save as the prerequisites laid down are fulfilled.
